urls.title: Full Video: Chinese President Xi Jinping gives 2021 New Year address

tweets.text:
As President Xi said, after this whole year we understand more than ever the significance of a community with a shared future for mankind.

We should join hands and support each other to dispel the gloom of the pandemic ASAP and build a better home for all.https://t.co/9v25RgVJiK

China has launched the largest-ever global humanitarian campaign in the history of the People's Republic, engaged in the most intensive virtual exchanges, and stepped up to our responsibility as the largest supplier of anti-epidemic materials. https://t.co/z39tNWLHch

#COVID19 - a health crisis of historic proportions - has shown us just how closely connected we all are. We saw how acts of kindness and care helped neighbors through times of great struggle. But we also witnessed how acts of malice, and misinformation, caused avoidable harm.

ChinağŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ in 2020
1âƒ£ Fight against #COVID19: Putting people first
2âƒ£ Economy: V-shaped recovery
3âƒ£ Major Sci-tech progress: Tianwen-1, Chang'e-5, Manned submersible Fendouzhe
4âƒ£ Moderately prosperous society: Zero poverty achieved https://t.co/3FL7cMIgjw

urls.title: Full Video: Chinese President Xi Jinping gives 2021 New Year address

tweets.text:
Chinese President Xi Jinping gives 2021 New Year address:

Greatness is forged in the ordinary.
Heroes come from the people.
Every person is remarkable!
I wish you all a harmonious, smooth and auspicious year, full of happiness!

Watch the full remarks: 
https://t.co/bkLE4uXuCN

The threats we have faced in 2020 may have exposed our vulnerabilities, but they have also brought out the best of humanity. With hope & solidarity, we will defeat fear & division; with hands joined, we will find a path to a shared future. Let's make this our resolution for 2021. https://t.co/OsnqDh509V

3. HOW IMPORTANT IS IT? 
--"The signing of the RCEP is not only a landmark achievement of East Asian regional cooperation, but also a victory of multilateralism and free trade."  said #Chinese Premier Li Keqiang .
